# Random

> Standard library generic random functions.

<section class="usage">

## Usage

```javascript
var random = require( '@stdlib/random' );
```

#### random

Standard library generic random functions.

```javascript
var rand = random;
// returns {...}
```

</section>

<!-- /.usage -->

```javascript
console.log( getKeys( ns ) );
```
